page.title: 05Maxstoke-a child's view.
page.content: Maxstoke Castle is surrounded by trees.It is a small castle but it has had bits added on.I noticed that the castle had glass in the windows. When we were going down the lane,we saw Dukes Bridge.It was very old and made of stone.We went straight across.We saw it on the maps as well.The land around Maxstoke is mostly arable.That means that it has crops.We saw pastures with cows in as well.The first time we got off the mini-bus we went down a public footpath.We saw some remains of some old railway lines.They had been covered with dirt and gravel.Now it was a track to a place called Castle Farm.Near the castle there was lots of woodland.It had lots of trees and hedges.We saw a place called Birch Wood.I wondered if woodland had anything to do with it.
